.. _installation:

============
Installation
============

1.  Include as composer dependency using

    .. code-block:: bash

        composer require typo3fluid/fluid

2.  Run

    .. code-block:: bash

        composer install

    to generate the vendor class autoloader.

3.  The classes from `TYPO3.Fluid` can now be used in your composer project.
